page.title: 14Religion
page.content: There are two churches on Coll, the Church of Scotland and the United Free Church of Scotland. The missionary, Mr. John Campbell, runs the Church of Scotland, he is leaving in July. The Rev. Huite Sliep runs the United Free Church. Few people now attend church on Coll. There a few Catholics and Episcopalians who are attended to by visiting priests. There are two church buildings. The Church of Scotland was built in 1907. The minister at the time raised the money to build the church by holding a three day Sale of Work in Inverness. The minister for the Church of Scotland Parish, which is linked with Tiree, is the Rev. Donaldson from Tiree.
